mainEntity.name: How to vectorize an image for free online?

acceptedAnswer.text: Simply upload your JPG or PNG image to VectorizeAI, and our AI-powered tool will automatically convert it to a scalable SVG vector format. The process takes seconds and is completely free with no watermarks or registration required.

mainEntity.name: What image formats can I convert to SVG?

acceptedAnswer.text: VectorizeAI supports JPG, JPEG, and PNG image formats. Files can be up to 5MB in size. For best results, use high-resolution images with clear, defined shapes and minimal noise.

mainEntity.name: Is the vectorized SVG suitable for printing?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! Our AI-enhanced vectorization creates print-ready SVG files perfect for t-shirts, business cards, posters, and professional printing. The vectors are scalable without quality loss.

mainEntity.name: How long does the vectorization process take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Most images are processed within 10-30 seconds. Complex images with many details may take up to 2 minutes. Our AI-powered pipeline includes upscaling and optimization for the best results.

mainEntity.name: Can I use vectorized images for commercial purposes?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you retain full rights to your vectorized images. However, ensure you have proper licensing for the original image. VectorizeAI only processes your images and doesn't claim any ownership rights.
